node.name: The Brain
node.rich_text: 1. Dimaag ke baare mein galat soch (Myths)
❌ Myth 1: “Hum sirf 5–10% brain use karte hain.”
Ye jhooth hai.
• Science ne (EEG, fMRI jaise tools se) proof kiya hai ki
poora dimaag active hota hai
— har hissa kuch na kuch kaam kar raha hota hai.
❌ Myth 2: “Jo jaldi seekhta hai, wahi intelligent hota hai.”
◇ Har insaan ke brain ke alag region
alag speed se mature hote hain

. ▪ Logical thinking wala part ~20 saal ki age ke aas-paas develop hota hai.
◇ Example:
Einstein school mein slow learner the
2. Dimaag ka structure aur learning process
- Jab hum kuch naya seekhte hain:
◇ Hamare brain ke
physical structure mein changes aate hain

.
◇ Kuch log computer ke expert hote hain, lekin social skills weak hote hain – ye brain ke region-specific development ki wajah se hota hai.
3. Thought kya hai? (Author ki apni definition)
> “Thought = Internal/External influence par hamara reaction jisme hum apne past experience ke hisab se sochte hain.”
Example:
Scotland has 421 words for snow

◇ Sunte hi surprise hota hai (reaction), fir imagination chalu hoti hai, fir hum usse connect karte hain apne pehle se known knowledge se.
Yani: Soch =
Associations ki chain
(jese: Scotland → Snow → Words → Surprise) Ye associations
neurons ke network
mein store hote hain.
4. Conscious vs Subconscious Mind
Conscious Mind:

◇ Jab tu actively observe karta hai (e.g., tu ye text pad raha hai aur decide kar sakta hai idhar se hatna ya continue karna)
◇ Ye
active awareness
hai.
Subconscious Mind:
◇ Ye wo thoughts hain jo tu
actively feel nahi karta
, lekin wo teri
emotions, decisions aur behavior ko control karte hain

.
◇ Studies ne bataya: subconscious decision
30 sec pehle hota hai

, aur tu bas baad mein usse consciously feel karta hai.
◇ Example:
Libet Experiment
→ proof karta hai ki brain pehle decide karta hai, tu baad mein aware hota hai.
5. Libet Experiment Summary:

◇ Subject ko 2 light bulbs dikhaye jaate hain.
◇ Light ek-ek second mein on hoti hai.
◇ Jab light
500 milliseconds se kam time ke liye on hoti hai

, to wo consciously feel nahi hoti.
◇ Lekin subconscious fir bhi
sahi guess kar leta hai
, even bina conscious awareness ke.
Why is this important for YOU?
◇ Jab tu
apne learning, emotions, frustration aur focus

ko samajhne lagta hai, to tu: ▪ Better decision le sakta hai.
▪ Apne subconscious patterns ko train kar sakta hai.
▪ Smarter aur zyada focused learner ban sakta hai.
Summary for Hackers / Learners like you:

row.cell: Normal. Har brain alag speed se mature hota hai.
Jo tu actively feel karta hai
Brain physically change karta hai har naye learning se
